NUCLEAR MEDICINE REPORT
              ===========================
         Tc99m-MiBi MYOCARDIAL PERFUSION SCAN

Tc-99m sestamibi myocardial perfusion scan was done with dipyridamole stress. Dipyridamole 0.57 mg/kg was IV injected for 5 minutes. Tc-99m sestamibi was injected after pharmacological stress and at rest, L[10]mCi and L[25]mCi respectively. Images were started 60 min after 1st and 2nd injection with SPECT. Images were reconstructed with iterative reconstruction technique and displayed in multiple transaxial planes and 3D pictures.

Analysis of stress/ redistribution images show :
  1. Anterior wall : C20[Normal uptake.|Abnormal uptake, reversible|Abnormal uptake, partial reversible].
  2. Septal wall   : C20[Normal uptake.|Abnormal uptake, reversible|Abnormal uptake, partial reversible].
  3. Inferior wall : C20[Normal uptake.|Abnormal uptake, reversible|Abnormal uptake, partial reversible].
  4. Lateral wall  : C20[Normal uptake.|Abnormal uptake, reversible|Abnormal uptake, partial reversible].
  5. Apical wall   : C20[Normal uptake.|Abnormal uptake, reversible|Abnormal uptake, partial reversible].

The lung uptake was   normal L/H ratio was L4[] (stress)
                             L/H ratio was L4[] (rest)
    
NUCLEAR CARDIOLOGY DIAGNOSIS :
There is ischemia in the L[] wall
